channel.title: Neogeography on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Jon Udell and Andrew Turner talking about neogeography
item.description: Two friends, Jon Udell and Andrew Turner, in this piece on IT Conversations: Neocartography, neogeography, the geospatial web: These words and phrases evoke the unfolding drama at the intersection of physical and virtual space. Andrew Turner is in the thick of the action. In this conversation with host Jon Udell he discusses GeoCommons, pocketmaps, collaborative data curation, and the evolution of design in a world of networked spatial and temporal data.
